definitions.definition: ( ergative ) To suddenly excite someone, or to give someone great pleasure ; to ( figuratively ) electrify ; to experience such a sensation.
( ergative ) To (cause something to) tremble or quiver .
( obsolete ) To perforate by a pointed instrument; to bore; to transfix ; to drill .
( obsolete ) To hurl ; to throw ; to cast .

main_definition: ( ergative ) To suddenly excite someone, or to give someone great pleasure ; to ( figuratively ) electrify ; to experience such a sensation.
secondary_definitions: ( ergative ) To (cause something to) tremble or quiver .
( obsolete ) To perforate by a pointed instrument; to bore; to transfix ; to drill .
( obsolete ) To hurl ; to throw ; to cast .

definitions.definition: To drill and thread in one operation, using a tool bit that cuts the hole and the threads in one series of computer-controlled movements.

main_definition: ( machining ) To drill and thread in one operation, using a tool bit that cuts the hole and the threads in one series of computer-controlled movements.
